generic:link.msg:message: Unweighted and/or Weighted Amount for "Total Cash Outflows" are mandatory.
Unweighted and/or Weighted Amount for "Total Cash Inflows" are mandatory.
Unweighted and/or Weighted Amount for "Total Cash Outflows less Total Cash Inflows" are mandatory.
Unweighted and/or Weighted Amount for "25% of Total Cash outflows" are mandatory.
Unweighted and/or Weighted Amount for "Total Net Cash Outflows" are mandatory.
Amount for "Liquidity Coverage Ratio" are mandatory.
